https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l628I1tj1uraYw8idHsBrcdGHAY.jpg When a humorous script-reader in her New York apartment sees an ad in the Saturday Review of Literature for a bookstore in London that does mail order, she begins a very special correspondence and friendship with Frank Doel, the bookseller who works at Marks & Co., 84 Charing Cross Road. 84 Charing Cross Road
